Uses of Class
adept.common.EventMentionArgument.Builder

  • Packages that use EventMentionArgument.Builder 
    Package Description
    adept.common
    Provides common data structures for use in the ADEPT framework, including the input Document and its TokenStream containing every Token, and the output HltContentContainer containing multiple kinds of annotations, such as EntityMention and Relation, which are based on the Chunk class.

    • Uses of EventMentionArgument.Builder in adept.common

      Obtains a builder which can build an EventMentionArgument of the specified type with the specified filler.
